body: The parasite mentioned in the story is Eudiplozoon nipponicum. But the Diplozoidae has that habit. | Miura Yuu doesn't really pay attention to Takahashi Yuzuki, until when he saw her crying outside game centre and he can't get her out of his mind. Later, she came to him again, telling about how her mother is marrying again, and it feels like she doesn't care about her own daughter anymore. Yuu told her a story about parasite worm who would fuse with their partner and never separate again for the rest of their life. They even throw away their eyes after joining, such is love is blind. Instead, Yuzuki asks if she can forget everything like that, and they have sex. First, she wore his glasses, so both can't see well, like worms who discarded their eyes. Later he took it back, and it feels better when he can see her. He also don't like home, as his family is strict. In the ending, they went the to the same university.
Zamn this artist is top Tier
